home.title: Labor Lawyers in Barcelona
home.subtitle: Castori Laboral
home.description: At Castori Laboral, we have extensive experience in defending workers' rights and are experts in dismissals, workplace harassment, and compensation.

about.title: About us
about.missionText: Our goal is to facilitate workers in defending their rights and interests, providing them with our legal knowledge and extensive experience, both in court and in individual and collective negotiations.
about.visionText: We understand law practice as a way to have a social impact while defending workers' interests.
about.helpText: If you need a labor lawyer to resolve issues and defend your rights as a worker, you can consult with us and we will assist you as soon as possible.

lawyer.name: Eloi Orihuela Castro
education: Graduate in Law and Economics from Pompeu Fabra University
Master's in Legal Practice from Pompeu Fabra University, specializing in Labor Law
experience: Has extensive experience in defending Workers' Rights
Responsible for all types of claims against companies
Expert in objective dismissals for economic, technical, organizational, or production reasons
Has participated in collective negotiations advising workers' representatives
